Name: mediastinum sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma and malignant mediastinal mesenchymnal tumor that is located_in the mediastinum.

Name: posterior mediastinum cancer
Definition: A dermatophytosis that results_in contagious fungal infection located_in scalp

Name: malignant mediastinal neurogenic neoplasm
Definition: A mediastinal cancer that has_material_basis_in neural cells.

Name: mediastinal mesenchymal tumor
Definition: A thoracic cancer that is located_in the mediastinum.

Name: mediastinum teratoma
Definition: A teratoma that is located_in the mediastinum.

Name: extragonadal nonseminomatous germ cell tumor
Definition: An extragonadal germ cell cancer that are located_in the pineal gland in the brain

Name: mediastinum seminoma
Definition: An ovarian germ cell teratoma that is composed of tissues that originate from two or three of the following germ layers

Name: mediastinal malignant lymphoma
Definition: An endometrial adenocarcinoma that is composed predominantly or entirely of large eosinophilic cells.
